name: 円香
trans: On a boat in a vast, open ocean.

name: 小糸
text:
……あ、いた！
雛菜ちゃん、右の空だよ……！
trans:
......Ah, there it is!
Hinana-chan, look at the sky to your right......!

name: 雛菜
text:
……あ、ほんとだ～
飛んでるね～
trans:
......Ah, you're right～
It sure can fly～

name: 雛菜
text: また戻ってくるといいね～

name: 円香
text:
この船、海に浮かんだまま
進んでない
trans:
This boat's just floating in the sea,
and not moving at all.

name: 透
text:
だって
凪いでるし、今

name: 円香
text: ……うちらどこ向かってるんだっけ

name: 雛菜
text:
へ～だって～
なんとなく波に乗ってるし～
trans:
Hmmm～ Cos,
we were somehow just carried here by the waves～

name: 円香
text:
船の上、何もないし
何も釣れた様子がないんだけど
trans:
There's nothing in the boat.
And it doesn't look like we've caught anything either.

name: 小糸
text:
え、えっと……
からっぽだからだよ……！
trans:
E-Erm......
That's because it's empty here......!

name: 円香
text: それで、食料調達してるの？
trans: Also, are we getting any food?

name: 円香
text: それともただ退屈なだけ？
trans: Or are you just killing time again?

name: 円香
text: 私はなんで乗ってるの？
trans: Why am I on the boat?

name: 円香
text: どうせ考えたって無駄
trans: It's useless to think about that anyway.

name: 円香
text:
そもそも
なんで乗ってるのか
trans:
In the first place,
Why board the boat?

name: off
text:
きたから？
バーンって
trans:
Cos ever since we did,
It's been like, BAM, no?

name: 円香
text: それはきっかけでしょ
trans: But those are just what led to us being here.

name: 円香
text: みんなはどうして乗り続けるの
trans:
Why is everyone still onboard
(Voice: Why am I still onboard)
